ThingDef.Name: NovaBlossomAMW
ThingDef.label: novablossom
ThingDef.description: A small and very fast insect like mechanoid made for breaching fortified positions. Unlike most mechanoids, rather than moving with the main attack force it will go ahead to try and reach any fortifications. Main reason being the unstable core that it carries, which upon its death will detonate very violently, breaching open even the strongest walls.

ThingDef.Name: BlacklightAMW
ThingDef.label: blacklight
ThingDef.description: A small and incredibly fast suicider mechanoid. Has practically no combat capabilities, however upon death it will detonate its reactor causing a small antigrain explosion. Anything caught in its radius is likely to die instantly, even the body of mech itself disintegrates instantly.

ThingDef.Name: FrosthoundAMW
ThingDef.label: frosthound
ThingDef.description: A strange dog like mechanoid. Has decent combat capability. Upon death it causes a cryogenic explosion that inflicts massive amounts of pain for anyone cought in its radius.

ThingDef.Name: SupernovaAMW
ThingDef.label: supernova
ThingDef.description: A large, slow and well armored suicider mechanoid primarily used for total base destruction. Its not very dangerous in general combat but the explosion it releases upon death is devastating, especially to structures. DO NOT let it reach the colony at any cost.

ThingDef.Name: MechaDergAMW
ThingDef.label: mecha dragon
ThingDef.description: A massive heavily armored mechanoid dragon. Its very dangerous both in ranged and melee combat. At range it will spit plasma at its targets, while in close combat it will shred anything with its claws.

ThingDef.Name: MechaChargerAMW
ThingDef.label: charger
ThingDef.description: A wolf like mechanoid. Fast melee figher. Its powerful jaws can quickly shred people to pieces.

ThingDef.Name: MechaAnarchistAMW
ThingDef.label: anarchist
ThingDef.description: A insectoid mech that takes appearance of a scorpion. Usually armed with either a plasma cannon or laser gattling located in its tail. It is capable of supressing swarms of enemies both in range and melee.

ThingDef.Name: MechaHeadhunterAMW
ThingDef.label: headhunter
ThingDef.description: A insectoid mech that takes appearance of a unidentified insectoid. Armed with powerful energy cannon that is capable of firing accuratelly from very long range. It also has plasma pincers for melee engagements. It is however very fragile and lighly armored. It is capable of using cover.

ThingDef.Name: MechaPurgerAMW
ThingDef.label: purger
ThingDef.description: A massive, heavily armored insectoid mech that takes appearance of a spider. Fires a powerful energy blade.

ThingDef.Name: MechaReaperAMW
ThingDef.label: reaper
ThingDef.description: A massive, heavily armored insectoid mech that takes appearance of a spider. It carries varied heavy weapons which can cause large amounts collateral damage.

ThingDef.Name: MechaImpulseAMW
ThingDef.label: impulse
ThingDef.description: A wolf like mechanoid. Rather fast melee fighter.

ThingDef.Name: MechaScourgeAMW
ThingDef.label: scourge
ThingDef.description: A fox that was converted by the mechanoid hive. Despite being small it is still very dangerous in melee combat. It also has heavy plate shield on its head which helps it survive a decent amount of damage.

ThingDef.Name: MechaSawbladeAMW
ThingDef.label: sawblade
ThingDef.description: A strange mechanoid hybrid of a warg and cougar. Often armed with small and medium mechanoid weapons. And as it name suggests it is also quite dangerous in melee combat due to its bladed body.

ThingDef.Name: MechaSpikeAMW
ThingDef.label: spiker
ThingDef.description: A spiky wolf like mechanoid. Dangerous melee figher as it can rend people apart very quickly. Tends to carry ranged weapons.

ThingDef.Name: MechaThrumboAMW
ThingDef.label: mecha thrumbo
ThingDef.description: Its a mechanoid thrumbo... With a plasma horn... Good time to start panicking.

ThingDef.Name: MechaRenegadeAMW
ThingDef.label: renegade
ThingDef.description: A very strange, possibly experimental mechanoid. Appears wolf like but with very few features. The strange crystals on its back appears to drive it into unending frenzy.

ThingDef.Name: MechaSupressorAMW
ThingDef.label: suppressor
ThingDef.description: A mechanoid cobra. Capable of ranged poison spit that causes uncontrolable shaking which lowers targets movement, manipulation and causes vision to blur.

ThingDef.Name: MechaFlayerAMW
ThingDef.label: flayer
ThingDef.description: A small mechanoid raptor. Not very durable but it is very fast and armed with 2 small scythes.

ThingDef.Name: MechaVortexAMW
ThingDef.label: vortex
ThingDef.description: A mechanoid velociraptor. Despite looking like a melee fighter it is capable of ranged attacks via built in laser.

ThingDef.Name: MechaWraithAMW
ThingDef.label: wraith
ThingDef.description: A very, VERY large snake like mechanoid armed with a pair of massive scythes. It is so heavily armored that it has to balance its weight on its massive scythes. If it gets in melee range, it will kill its target with a single hit cutting straight through even most powerful armors.

ThingDef.Name: MechaNomadAMW
ThingDef.label: nomad
ThingDef.description: A humanoid mechanoid. Armed with a very powerful assault rifle and capable of using cover.

ThingDef.Name: MechaSeekerAMW
ThingDef.label: seeker
ThingDef.description: A humanoid mechanoid. Very agile and armed with a energy sword akin to a katana.

ThingDef.Name: MechaSpectreAMW
ThingDef.label: spectre
ThingDef.description: A humanoid mechanoid with feminine features and metal "wings". Rather than carrying a weapons it uses its "wings" as a sort of kinetic bombardment projectiles. Capable of firing over walls.

ThingDef.Name: MechaStalkerAMW
ThingDef.label: stalker
ThingDef.description: A humanoid mechanoid. It carries a very powerful sniper rifle that can penetrate even heavy power armor with ease.
